metadata.name: Cybernetic Dream City #1/20
metadata.description:
I had a surreal dream that felt like I was in a completely different world. Everything was so vividly colored and animated, and it was as if I was transported into a futuristic city.

The first thing I noticed was the sky - it was a deep shade of purple with hints of pink and blue, and there were these strange swirling clouds that seemed to move in a slow, hypnotic dance. The buildings around me were towering and metallic, with flashing lights and neon signs that seemed to pulse with energy.

As I looked around, I saw that the people around me were not quite human - they were more like anime characters come to life, with bright hair and large, expressive eyes. Some of them had cybernetic enhancements, with glowing circuitry and metal plating on their bodies.

But that was just the beginning - as I explored the city, I found myself in the midst of a complex network of robots and other advanced technologies. There were machines that could transform into different shapes and sizes, hoveri
